name: Neofeud
description: Neofeud is a Dystopic Cyberpunk adventure game in the vein of Blade Runner, but with an overlay of Game of Thrones-like political intrigue, and 1366x768, hand-painted, stylized visuals.
minimum_requirements: OS: 98 Processor: Pentium Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Any DirectX-compatible video card Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 2.10 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Any DirectX-compatible video card DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Any
